detaileddescription.para:
Signal function of the list
list
pointer to a list object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Signal function of the list buttons
btn
pointer to a button on the list
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Make a single button selected in the list, deselect others, should be called in list btns call back.
btn
pointer to the currently pressed list btn object

Check if this is really a list button or another object.
list_btn
List button

Check if this is really a list image or another object.
list_image
List image

Check if this is really a list label or another object.
list_label
List label

Create a list objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new list
copy
pointer to a list object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created list

Delete all children of the scrl object, without deleting scrl child.
obj
pointer to an object

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_obj_t *list, const void *img_src, const char *txt, lv_event_cb_t event_cb)
memberdef.name: lv_list_add

detaileddescription.para:
Add a list element to the list
list
pointer to list object
img_fn
file name of an image before the text (NULL if unused)
txt
text of the list element (NULL if unused)
event_cb
specify the an event handler function. NULL if unused
pointer to the new list element which can be customized (a button)

Remove the index of the button in the list
list
pointer to a list object
index
pointer to a the button's index in the list, index must be 0 <= index < lv_list_ext_t.size
true: successfully deleted

Set single button selected mode, only one button will be selected if enabled.
list
pointer to the currently pressed list object
mode enable(true)/disable(false)
single selected mode.

Make a button selected
list
pointer to a list object
btn
pointer to a button to select NULL to not select any buttons

Set scroll animation duration on 'list_up()' 'list_down()' 'list_focus()'
list
pointer to a list object
anim_time
duration of animation [ms]

Set a style of a list
list
pointer to a list object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get single button selected mode.
list
pointer to the currently pressed list object.

Get the text of a list element
btn
pointer to list element
pointer to the text

Get the label object from a list element
btn
pointer to a list element (button)
pointer to the label from the list element or NULL if not found

Get the image object from a list element
btn
pointer to a list element (button)
pointer to the image from the list element or NULL if not found

Get the previous button from list. (Starts from the top button)
list
pointer to a list object
prev_btn
pointer to button. Search the previous before it.
pointer to the previous button or NULL when no more buttons

Get the next button from list. (Starts from the bottom button)
list
pointer to a list object
prev_btn
pointer to button. Search the next after it.
pointer to the next button or NULL when no more buttons

Get the index of the button in the list
list
pointer to a list object. If NULL, assumes btn is part of a list.
btn
pointer to a list element (button)
the index of the button in the list, or -1 of the button not in this list

Get the number of buttons in the list
list
pointer to a list object
the number of buttons in the list

Get the currently selected button
list
pointer to a list object
pointer to the selected button

Get scroll animation duration
list
pointer to a list object
duration of animation [ms]

Get a style of a list
list
pointer to a list object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style

Move the list elements up by one
list
pointer a to list object

Move the list elements down by one
list
pointer to a list object

Focus on a list button. It ensures that the button will be visible on the list.
btn
pointer to a list button to focus
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON: scroll with animation, LV_ANOM_OFF: without animation
